Name: Encounter: Wildfire
Description: Before each night, you lose the game if there are seven or more 🔥 on the field.

Name: The Firestarter
Description:
This enemy gets +X 🗡️, where X is the number of 🔥 on the field. This effect can't be blanked.
This enemy gets +X ❤️, where X is two times the number of 🔥 on the field. This effect can't be blanked.

Name: Fuel for the Fire
Description:
Don't remove ⏳ from other durations during the time passes step.
Hero card effects can't remove ⏳ from other durations.

Name: Smoke Inhalation
Description: After you play an action, discard it.

Name: Encroaching Flames
Description:
If you would recover X vitality, you may remove X ⏳ from this duration instead.
As time passes, if there is exactly 1 ⏳ on this, you lose 6 vitality.

Name: Swirling Ashes
Description: As time passes, you lose 1 vitality. If there are five or more 🔥 on the field, you lose 2 vitality instead.

Name: Crumbling Structure
Description: You may deal damage to this as if it were an enemy. If you do, remove X ⏳ from it, where X is the damage dealt.

Name: Heat Wave
Description:
This deals X damage, where X is the number of 🔥 on the field. 
If there are three or fewer 🔥 on the field, surge.

Name: Emberling
Description:
If there are five or more 🔥 on the field, this enemy gets +2 🗡️.
Surge.
